item.title: [B][COLOR aquamarine]Multicanales [/COLOR][COLOR lightblue] MaxDeportes [/B][/COLOR] [COLOR lightslategray]Bro.cast[/COLOR]

regex.name: makelist
regex.listrepeat: <title>[COLOR lightblue] [makelist.param2] [/COLOR] </title> <link>$doregex[bro.adca.st]</link> <thumbnail>http://adryanlist.org/adryan/img/deportes.jpg</thumbnail><info>Recuerda hacer tu donacion para seguir mejorando Adryanlist en http://paypal.me/Adryanlist</info>

regex.name: bro.adca.st
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = 'http://bro.adca.st/stream.php?id=[makelist.param1]&p=1&c=0&stretching=uniform&old=0'): import requests, re, urllib headers = {'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64; rv:52.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/52.0'} headers['Referer'] = 'http://maxdeportv.net/indexa.php?canal=1' source = requests.get(url, headers=headers) m3u8 = re.findall('trap = "(.+?)"', source.text)[0] m3u8 = m3u8.decode('base64') tokenpage = re.findall('nws1 = "(.+?)"', source.text)[0] headers['Referer'] = url headers['X-Requested-With'] = 'XMLHttpRequest' headers['Accept'] = 'application/json, text/javascript, */*; q=0.01' headers['Accept-Language'] = 'en-US,en;q=0.5' source = requests.get('http://bro.adca.st/%s'%tokenpage, headers=headers) m3u8 = m3u8 + re.findall(':"(.+?)"', source.text)[0] + '|User-Agent=%s&Referer=http://bro.adca.st/&Origin=http://bro.adca.st'%headers['User-Agent'] return m3u8

item.info: Recuerda hacer tu donacion para seguir mejorando Adryanlist en http://paypal.me/Adryanlist
